flc.nbl_actors.core

Class ThreadActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • flc.nbl_actors.core.ThreadActivity

  • public class ThreadActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    Track thread activity.

    Example - Listen to multiple factories: 

     
  ThreadActivity.listenTo(factory1, factory2)
          .onEmptyShutdown()
          .await(0);
    Date: 08.01.14

      • listenTo

        public static ThreadActivity.Counts listenTo(java.util.List<IGreenThrFactory> factories)
        Listen to activity in thread factories.

        Calls IGreenThrFactory.setActiveListener(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Boolean>) and keeps a list of given factories.

        Parameters:
        factories - thread factories
        Returns:
        factories wrapper

      • setActive

        public boolean setActive(boolean active)
        Set if active
        Parameters:
        active - true if active
        Returns:
        true if changed

      • setListener

        public void setListener(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Boolean> listener)
        Set active listener. (false when no threads have remaining work/messages).
        Parameters:
        listener - active listener
